snippet.title: Grabbed by the Ghoulies-Exclusive E3 2003 Reveal Footage
snippet.description:
This is camera footage of the game from E3 2003 that was preserved on the Uol Jogos and GamerExtreme websites through the wayback machine. There is no sound sadly. 

This trailer was never put on YouTube surprisingly and most of the trailers are the official E3 2003 Trailer so I thought I would upload it.
